about_the_game:
Tunnels under Yorion is a classic roguelike that rewards exploration and player skill during short runs (sometimes just 20 minutes). Fight monsters using turn-based hack-and-slash combat, explore procedurally-generated dungeons, and manage your inventory of weapons and magic items. Make friends and enemies among the denizens of the depths of prison dungeons, catacomb-like caves, and thorny forest.

In adventure mode, you can make camp in a grotto that has trapped some rich soil. Plant the seeds you found along the way. Grow the plants that might save you on your next run.



Features
  • Intuitive combat mechanics
  • Procedural dungeon generation in three unique biomes
  • Varied monster behaviour, leading to complex interactions
  • A variety of consumable fruits and vegetables
  • Your own cavern to plant the seeds you find, and watch them grow
  • Rich pixel artwork
  • Hit points and experience points, but also status effects like hunger, poison, and curses

Be sure to ask for help along the way.


And keep exploring, you might find new lands as you climb higher.

name: Tunnels Under Yorion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
